ai-patthana21.31:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.31:0.3_0: There is ten supported by the road, based on the path.
ai-patthana21.31:1.1_0: Not because of the simile of the path, the support that arises.
ai-patthana21.31:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana21.31:3.1_0: Nor makes the cause or condition for the sake of worldly gaining a cause.
